rows.label: qst700302_msg0001
rows.name: Hey, there. Did you miss us?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0002
rows.name: We fixed your faulty lanterns.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0003
rows.name:
Remind me why we're the ones
running around doing odd jobs for
this guy?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0004
rows.name:
Let's try to put things into perspective,
Hikari. It's for the good of the people.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0005
rows.name: Great, thanks a bunch.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0006
rows.name:
That's a load off my mind. It would've
been a while before I could get round
to fixing those.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0007
rows.name: Yo, Chalcy?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0008
rows.name: Nii-san? What's up?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0009
rows.name:
If the lanterns were bothering you so
much, why didn't you just ask me?
I could've fixed them for you.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0010
rows.name:
Nah, I didn't want to have to rely
on you this time.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0011
rows.name:
I've been relying on you most of my
life, ever since mum went.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0012
rows.name:
Gwahaha! Chalcedony, have you got
a minute?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0013
rows.name: Sarge!

rows.label: qst700302_msg0014
rows.name:
Sorry to barge in, but I've got urgent
news to tell you.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0015
rows.name:
Chalcedony, you're promoted.
Come join the squad!

rows.label: qst700302_msg0016
rows.name: Wait...I'm...huh? But what did I do?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0017
rows.name:
You went and fixed those lanterns.
None of the men in my regiment
even took notice of them.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0018
rows.name:
Proof enough to show your dedication
to bettering the lives of our citizens.
Something our squad's severely lacking.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0019
rows.name:
Uh, that may be so, but it wasn't
actually me who repaired them.
It was these kind travelers...

rows.label: qst700302_msg0020
rows.name:
That so? Well then, travelers, how
would you like a place in our ranks?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0021
rows.name: Thanks, but no.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0022
rows.name: Hahaha! Very blunt!

rows.label: qst700302_msg0023
rows.name:
We may have repaired the lanterns,
but Chalcedony here was the one
who asked us to fix them.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0024
rows.name:
In all honesty, it's him you should be
thanking.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0025
rows.name:
I couldn't agree more! The lad's more
than talented enough to join my team.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0026
rows.name:
Are... Are you absolutely sure
about this?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0027
rows.name:
What, you prefer to stay on guard
duty? Didn't you once say it was
"dull as a sack of Gromrice"?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0028
rows.name:
Come on, Chalcy, this is your big
chance! You can't turn down an offer
like this!

rows.label: qst700302_msg0029
rows.name: Nii-san, you're doing it again...

rows.label: qst700302_msg0031
rows.name:
Sarge...I'm in. Just as long as you
can give me a job I can really sink
my teeth into!

rows.label: qst700302_msg0032
rows.name:
Gwahaha! Oh there's no shortage of
those, believe you me!

rows.label: qst700302_msg0033
rows.name: That's more like it. Do us proud, bro.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0034
rows.name: You can count on it.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0036
rows.name: Thank you, all of you.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0037
rows.name:
Everything's been happening so fast...
I never expected any of this.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0038
rows.name:
And I just about owe all of it to you.
Thank you SO much.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0039
rows.name:
Are you going to be all right without
your older brother?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0040
rows.name:
Totally. I've been trying to work my
way up the ladder for a while now.
I don't need him hand-holding me.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0041
rows.name:
Oh, I see. Well, if that's what you've
decided...

rows.label: qst700302_msg0042
rows.name:
It is. Again, from the bottom of my
heart, thank you!
